game.description: A mysterious cult has been secretly gathering in the nearby ruins, performing dark rituals to summon an ancient evil. You have been tasked with infiltrating the ruins and putting an end to their nefarious plans.
game.objective: Stop the cult's dark ritual and destroy the artifact they seek to summon.
game.quest_giver: Rumor has it that a local trader named Gorvoth knows more about the cult's plans than he lets on. You can find him at the local tavern, The Red Griffin Inn.
game.reward: A small chest containing 100 gold pieces and a vial of healing potion

tasks.description: Gather information from Gorvoth at the Red Griffin Inn
tasks.location: The Red Griffin Inn (located in the town of Willowdale)
tasks.objective: Convince Gorvoth to share what he knows about the cult's plans

tasks.description: Infiltrate the ruins and gather intel on the cult's dark ritual
tasks.location: The abandoned ruins (located north of Willowdale)
tasks.objective: Stealthily make your way through the ruins without being detected by the cultists

tasks.description: Stop the cult's dark ritual by destroying the artifact
tasks.location: The cult's summoning circle (located in the heart of the ruins)
tasks.objective: Use your wits and any available tools to destroy the artifact and put an end to the ritual
